Reviews.Title: Q5 BlackBerry
Reviews.Author: Grwg Jackson
Reviews.Content: Excellent little smartphone for the price. Online issue is this phone does not work on Canadian LTE networks. It appears to be the UK model. If I had known that I would not have purchased it.

Reviews.Title: excellent!
Reviews.Author: Patricia R.
Reviews.Content: This cell phone is an excellent option for bb fans!  It combines the very best of the two worlds (touch and qwerty). Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great!!!
Reviews.Author: MA
Reviews.Content: Love the new apps! The best smart phone! I hope the company never goes out of business! it is a great phone.

Reviews.Title: Great keyboard!!!!
Reviews.Author: Danielle Collin
Reviews.Content: This a great phone. Super fast, and best keyboard available on a smart phone. Reminds me of my favorite phone ever BB curve

Reviews.Title: The team is excellent in Venezuela
Reviews.Author: Yajaira
Reviews.Content: I loved the phone I'll recommend it to all people who want a good smart team in his hands. I came in perfect condition, for people of Venezuela I run my perfect with me Movilnet line. thanks!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Talal
Reviews.Content: good I like it and it is clear and ease to use I did not see any thing like it

Reviews.Title: This is European Version--Plugs Don't Fit USA Sockets
Reviews.Author: simone
Reviews.Content: The plugs are made for European outlets so I couldn't keep the phone. Also, this did not come with the 8GB memory card it is supposed to include.I can't say whether the phone itself is good because I packed it up without turning it on once I realized I couldn't use it here in US.

Reviews.Title: My brother is loving it...
Reviews.Author: Dau
Reviews.Content: My brother had asked me to get him a BB within a affordable range of prices. I got him this one and he is simply thrilled!Not only it has more features than the previous versions, but it also has the option of being used both touch screen and key pad...I have not used it, but seing the way he's in love with it, I can only say that it met his expectation. Great product.
